itemDescription: Polish-born British entrepreneur and theatrical impresario

wikipedia_page.main: Henry Lowenfeld in Polish, Henryk Loewenfeld, (1859–1931) was a Polish-born British entrepreneur and theatrical impresario. He founded the Kops Brewery, the UK's first UK brewer of non-alcoholic beer, and built London's Apollo Theatre and the Ocean Hotel in Sandown on the Isle of Wight.
